casebody.data:
EXNER SAND & GRAVEL CORPORATION, owner of the Scow Florence E, Libellant-Appellant, v. John Walter SWENSON and Carl Swenson, doing business under the name and style of John Swenson Drydocks, Respondent-Appellee. THE FLORENCE E. No. 211, Docket 22739. United States Court of Appeals Second Circuit. Argued April 6 and 7, 1954. Decided April 27, 1954. Purdy, Lamb & Catoggio, New York City (Edmund F. Lamb, New York City, •of counsel), for libellant-appellant. Mahar & Mason, New York City (Frank C. Mason, New York City, of •counsel), for respondents-appellees.

Before CHASE, Chief Judge, and SWAN and FRANK»- Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed on the opinion below. D.C., 110 F.Supp. 531.
